_id.description: A unique identifier for the molecule

public.description: Boolean value. If true, molecule is public outside of D3TaLES. If false, it is not.

mol_info.description: The basic structural information derivable from the molecule's SMILES structure

mol_characterization.description: Details of quantum chemical calculations on the molecule including charge species

species_characterization.description: Details of quantum chemical calculations on the molecule including charge species

synthesis.description: Details of 3D geometry of the molecule including charge species
